title: Best of Key Bank Studio: Bruce Cockburn, Dianne Reeves & Julien Labro
teaser: Dee Perry shares some of her favorite performances from this past year recorded in the Key Bank Studio at Idea Center in PlayhouseSquare.  Listen for performances by Canadian folk legend Bruce Cockburn, jazz chanteuse Dianne Reeves and French accordion master Julien Labro.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 MPX. To see more, visit .
